alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 21 at 2:12PM MDT until October 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Will Continue Through Saturday For Portions of Northeast Wyoming and Southern South Dakota... .Warm, dry, and breezy weather will continue this afternoon and again Saturday across portions of northeast Wyoming and southwest South Dakota. Combined with dry fuels, this will produce critical fire weather conditions this afternoon and again Saturday. ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 315 AND 317... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 315 Southern Campbell and 317 Weston County Plains. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity will produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
